about_the_game:
– About the Game

Our time together...

The Quintessential Quintuplets OMOIDE VR ~YOTSUBA~ is the second official VR adventure game based on the popular manga series!

Play as Futaro Uesugi and enjoy spending time with the fourth Nakano Quint, Yotsuba, in this VR adventure game.

Get closer to Yotsuba by experiencing Futaro's daily life.

[All Your Favorite Scenes From the Manga Recreated in VR]
Enjoy a selection of scenes from the manga recreated in fully-voiced VR.
Try to listen out for all your favorite lines as you interact with Yotsuba.

[Experience Daily Life With Yotsuba]
Get closer than ever using VR.
Make memories with Yotsuba and watch as she does her signature smile before your very eyes!

[Multiple Dialogue Options & Endings]
Select from a variety of dialogue options as you play through the game.
Keep Yotsuba in mind and choose carefully to get the best ending!

– Featured Characters
Yotsuba Nakano (Voiced by Ayane Sakura)
Futaro Uesugi (Played by you!)

©Negi Haruba / Kodansha Ltd.

©Blackc Inc.
